ai.summary: An easy 3 km woodland loop in the UK, ideal for families and casual walkers seeking a relaxed outdoor experience. The route follows shaded paths through coppice woodland with gentle grades and minimal ascent.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat and well-maintained paths through coppice woodland. Expect compact soil with occasional exposed roots and damp patches after rain; some sections may be slightly slippery.
ai.safety_notes: As with any UK woodland walk: wear sturdy footwear, stay on marked paths, and watch for mud after rain. Be mindful of uneven ground and exposed roots; check weather and daylight hours before you go. Keep pets under control, and be aware of wildlife. Carry a map or offline navigation and a phone for emergencies. In summer, use sun protection; in spring and autumn, wear layering. Tick awareness in long grass; check for ticks after the walk.
recommended_gear: Mobile phone with offline map or local area info
ai.best_seasons: Spring through autumn; winter visits can be muddy and daylight is shorter.

seo.title: Machell's Coppice Trail – Easy 3 km Woodland Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Machell's Coppice Trail, a gentle 3 km route through UK woodland. Learn about terrain, safety tips, gear recommendations, and the best seasons for this easy hike.
